title: 74. Aell, Ambitious Shaper
content:
This change affects the first printing. Revised text is highlighted.

ENTERS PLAY:

  • IF YOU ARE ON GRUESOME FEAST, GO TO 74.1
  • IF YOU ARE ON REMOVE THE RECLAIMERS, GO TO 1.19
  • OTHERWISE, GO TO 74.3

  • OTHERWISE, GO TO 74.5
